short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Flaimer ADS and enjoy ad-free online content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online advertising is often a waste of time and can put your personal information at risk if you're not careful. The most popular solution to this situation is to use one of the ad blockers in your browser. Our product is one such tool, just install Flaimer ADS and enjoy online content.

Flaimer ADS is a must-have extension for your browser.

Flaimer ADS is based on extensive ad blocking lists that can block and deal with different types of ads. Our product helps remove ads from videos, blocks pop-ups on many websites and also deals with various banners. Flaimer ADS also conserves your internet traffic, which is very important for those who don't have an unlimited data plan.

Our product is completely free for all users. All you have to do is install it in your browser. We don't ask for any personal information, so there's no need to worry about your privacy being compromised.
 
Your privacy is of paramount importance
If you still have questions, you can always consult our website. There you will find information about licensing and our privacy policy.
